item.title: Database Project Assignment - BCIS
item.description: COMP508: Database System Design - Database Project Assignment - A+ level (100%) Below is the Database Project Assignment for the COMP508 paper. If the preview does not work, click the link here. Summary This project involved Analysing a case study to develop the business rules Designing a logical Entity Relationship Diagram Creating tables in Oracle SQL Populating the tables with data Constructing SQL queries, working with the populated data Case Study for Database Project Assignment “A major faculty consisting of many Departments in the Whangarei University of Technology (WUT) has approached you for the design and implementation of a relational database system.
